g.text: Go to your cloned copy of your dedicated instance of SaC

a.title: Right click to open in a new window or a new tab
a.xlink:title: Right click to open in a new window or a new tab

g.text: Create Sequence diagram and add to UML folder

a.title: Right click to open PlantUml in a new window or a new tab
a.xlink:title: Right click to open PlantUml in a new window or a new tab

g.text: can be used to create UML files.

a.title: Right click to open Real World PlantUml in a new window or a new tab
a.xlink:title: Right click to open Real World PlantUml in a new window or a new tab

g.text: provides a wide set of UML samples.
Add sequence to designated mission in mission.json

a.title: Right click to open in a new window or a new tab
a.xlink:title: Right click to open in a new window or a new tab

g.text: was provided with some basic unit tests
As you add content be sure to ensure the test coverage is maintained
Commit changes and verify pipeline is green;
The continuous integration pipeline automatically generates the SVG images from the UML files.
If you want to generate the SVG files locally you can run the generatesvg.sh script to generate the SVG images from the sequence UML files;
Once changes are merged. If the pipeline hasn't deployed your site, deploy it manually by running the command npm run deploy;
if grooming requires feasibility work or being done by a new developer.
Peer review on dev server, changes incorporated in next review cycle.
Code reviewed by development team Tech Leads, changes incorporated in the next development cycle.
When review complete code migrated to DevTest so testers can start testing.
First testing round. Defects logged with developers. Dev cycle repeats until testing passes.
Work reviewed by the Global Tech Lead as part of a general release building process.
When review complete code migrated to DevQA so testers can start testing as part of a release can commence.
Defects logged. Significant defects may need to be raised as stories for prioritization by POs.
When work complete code migrated to
